hackathon-description-text: SteelHacks is an event hosted at the University of Pittsburgh, through the Department of Computer Science, for students at colleges & universities across the US who are passionate about getting their hands dirty using technology and design.
hackathon-eligibility: As an MLH event, we follow their guidlines. Please see their website for more details.
hackathon-requirements: Submit all code on to website.
hackathon-rules: We olidge by all MLH rules.  Please see their website for more details.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1st Choice of either : Beats Headphones, Sony Bluetooth portable speakers, or Rokus
2nd Choice of either : Beats Headphones, Sony Bluetooth portable speakers, or Rokus
3rd Choice of either : Beats Headphones, Sony Bluetooth portable speakers, or Rokus
Awarded for Best Domain Name from Domain.com. Prize is Domain.com Swag Bags

Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment! Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Members of the winning team receive Hack Harassment Battery Packs!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=100 Lytton Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Judging will be based on creativity, ingenuity, etc

hackathon-description-header: SteelHacks is an event hosted at the University of Pittsburgh, through the Department of Computer Science, for students across the US who are passionate about getting their hands dirty using tech
